report.title: Time lapse data
report.description: Report to populate the time-lapse map.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN samples smp on smp.id=o.sample_id and smp.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: sample_method
param.join: JOIN cache_termlists_terms t on t.id=smp.sample_method_id and t.term = '#sample_method#'

param.name: grid_size
param.description: Snaps spatial refs to a grid of this size, resulting in less data to load
